long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hangman is an engaging word-guessing game that is now available as a Chrome Extension. It can also be played for free on the website https://monkeymart.org/. In Hangman, players are presented with a hidden word and must guess the letters one by one to uncover the word. With each incorrect guess, a part of the hangman's gallows is drawn, adding to the suspense. The objective is to guess the word correctly before the hangman is fully drawn. It's a fun and challenging game that tests your vocabulary and deduction skills. Play Hangman on the Monkey Mart website and see if you can save the hangman from his fate!


*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://monkeymart.org/
